entry.title: Error: Permission Denied (Publickey). Fatal: Could Not Read From Remote Repository.
entry.content:
Error: Permission denied (publickey). fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

When I tried to use rake deloy command to deloy my blog change to GitHub I got the folloing error:

Permission denied (publickey). fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

It’s actually not big deal since you just need to update your ssh so that GitHub can match with your local key.

Below is the link telling you how to generate the key: Generate-SSH-Key
